Mapzen Web Styleguide

Philosophy of styleguide: Stretch out with your feelings. In my experience, there's no such thing as luck.

Design Elements

Fonts

We use Playfair Display for headings, Open Sans for body copy and Montserrat for documentation and the footer. Hopefully we will consolidate Montserrat and Open Sans in the future! ;)

Start where you are.

Open Sans

Start where you are.

Playfair Display

Start where you are.

Montserrat
Colors

There are three primary brand colors that are derived from the logo. These are mostly used as accents like red headings are strongly Mapzen. (Use the class names for colors as much as possible. The hex values are for use outside of code like for design, presentations etc.)

Mapzen Red

#d4645c

Mapzen Blue

#6ea0a4

Mapzen Yellow

#e6ead2

Secondary colors complement the primary palette and are used for text, borders etc.

Off Black

#191919

Dark Gray

#444444

Medium Gray

#666666

Light Gray

#f8f8f8

Tertiary colors are derived from the primary colors and are used in rare cases like as hover states for buttons

Dark Red

#993434

Dark Blue

#385d5c

Dark Yellow

#d3c756

Brown

#563630
Typography

This is the paragraph text style. It is the name of your true self. You've only forgotten. I know there is good in you. The Emperor hasn't driven it from you fully. That is why you couldn't destroy me. That's why you won't bring me to your Emperor now. I see you have constructed a new lightsaber. Your skills are complete. Indeed, you are powerful, as the Emperor has foreseen. Come with me.

This is the basic text style emboldened. Leave that to me! Damn fool. I knew that you were going to say that!

H1's are used as page titles.

This is the H1 text style

This is the H2 text style

This is the H3 text style

This is the H4 text style

This is the H5 text style
This is the H6 text style

This is a link style.

This is a caption/attribution style for images and demos on the blog.

This is how code snippets are styled.
“Laugh it up, Fuzz ball.” — Han Solo (The Empire Strikes Back)

Are they away? They have just made the jump into hyperspace. You're sure the homing beacon is secure aboard their ship? I'm taking an awful risk, Vader. This had better work. I'm taking an awful risk, Vader. This had better work. Luke! Luke! Luke! Luke! Luke, Luke, grab a hold of this. Blast it, will you! My gun's jammed. Where? Anywhere! Oh!! Luke! Luke! Grab him!

Buttons

This is the primary button style for important calls to action. Two primary buttons cannot be used next to each other.

This is the secondary button style. Used next to a primary style if there are two buttons next to each other

This is the secondary button style. Used next to a primary style if there are more than one buttons next to each other
